events.name: TomorrowToday SG - The Forgotten Half of Change
events.description:
To help you stay up to speed with what’s happening in the world of innovation, creativity and design, we organize high pressure meetups called TomorrowToday.

This 2nd event in our series will discuss the relationship between creativity and innovation, reality and perception. Where innovation seeks to change reality by delivering new products or services, creativity is essential for changing perception: the way people think about these products or services. More often than not, this second aspect of change is overlooked, resulting in failed product launches or services that people don't comprehend.
events.location: The Co. at 99 Duxton, 99 Duxton Road, Singapore 089543

events.name: Creative Crew Talks - Our Community
events.description:
December 2017 will be the last meet up for Creative Crew at the library. From next year, we will be hosting our meet up in a different format. We would like to invite everyone whom has attended our past meet up to come and join us one last time at Toa Payoh library.


Getting involved with the open tech community in Singapore! - Sayanee Basu

Singapore’s grassroots volunteer driven community in technology is growing and vibrant! It’s very easy to get involved, learn about new technologies and make new friends. Come and listen to practical tips on getting in touch with the tech community in Singapore!


9 Years in the community, What I have learnt and What I have gained - Leon Lim

I attended my first Creative Crew meeting on 9/1/2009. After 9 years of helping to organise creative crew meetup and also attending other meetups, I would like to share my journey, my experience and what I have gained from being part of the meet up community.  


Creative Crew 2018 ( A Reboot ) - Leon Lim

I will be sharing what are the new plans and format for Creative Crew in the new year

Register Here
https://www.eventbrite.sg/e/creative-crew-talks-our-community-tickets-40929375865

events.name: How to build a great data science team
events.description:
"The secret of my success is that we have gone to exceptional lengths to hire the best people in the world." – Steve Jobs
Finding a great data scientist who has good coding skills, deep statistical expertise, communication skills plus relevant commercial experience has been compared to hunting for unicorns. A scarcity of experienced data science talent is only half the story. For those looking to hire data scientists, technical analysts and data engineers, there are a range of options for tipping the odds in your favour of finding that perfect hire. Learn to see the problem through the eyes of a data scientist, and indeed see how even recruitment itself can be optimised using data science techniques.

Takeaways
How to overcome difficulties in hiring for Data roles
What to look for when trying to find a Data Scientist to join your team

Speakers
Rana Banerji, General Manager, Tridant Asia
Eugene Yan Ziyou, Data Science Lead, Lazada
Sigrid Rouam, Lead Data Scientist, SGX
Emma (Wilson) Mourad, Managing Director, APAC, Big Data For Humans
Celine LE COTONNEC, Chief Data Officer, AXA Insurance Singapore

Agenda
6:30-7:00pm - registration & networking
7:00-8:15 - panel discussionn & Q&A
